metadata.synopsis: The player or Laezel can win the combat, resulting in branching at the start Laezel realizes that it's not combat prowess that makes you worth her feelings, but it's all the times you had each other's backs.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Finish the battle with Laezel after she wakes you up at night and challenges you to a duel.

12.speaker: Lae'zel
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] The player has been defeated by Lae'zel. They are kneeling, clutching their belly. Lae'zel stands in front of them victorious but upset.

35.speaker: Lae'zel
35.context: NodeContext: Not mad - panicked. She has truly hurt the one she likes

76.speaker: Narrator
76.text: *Lae'zel's touch is unusually gentle. Her fingers lightly graze your bruises and wipe away your sweat.*
76.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel crouches and pulls the short player up by their hands.

67.speaker: Narrator
67.text: *Lae'zel's touch is unusually gentle. Her fingers lightly graze your bruises and wipe away your sweat.*
67.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Lae'zel gently caresses the short player's face and neck.

63.speaker: Narrator
63.text: *Lae'zel's touch is unusually gentle. Her fingers lightly graze your bruises and wipe away your sweat.*
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Lae'zel gently caresses the player's face and neck.

51.speaker: Lae'zel
51.text: No more. I can't bear it.
51.context: NodeContext: With panic and concern for the player.

45.speaker: Lae'zel
45.text: I've torn flesh from monsters and men. I've laughed as they suffered. But you -
45.context: NodeContext: With concern for the player.

43.speaker: Lae'zel
43.text: I don't want to hurt you - I want to protect you. For you to protect me.
43.context: NodeContext: With concern for the player. Coming to a realisation of her feelings for the player.

38.speaker: Lae'zel
38.context: NodeContext: Coming to a realisation of her feelings for the player. But not too plaintive, very subtle.

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.context: NodeContext: Coming to a realisation of her feelings for the player. But not too plaintive, very subtle.

21.speaker: Lae'zel
21.text: Pull her close. Press your lips against hers.

24.speaker: Player
24.text: Pull her close. Press your lips against hers.

74.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Lae'zel is on her knees, holding her belly after losing combat.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: Take her hand and pull her up.
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] The player pulls Lae'zel up from her kneeling position, and they face each other.

56.text: I should be humiliated. I should know the shame of defeat. I am Lae'zel -
56.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] The player pulls Lae'zel up from her kneeling position, and they face each other.

6.speaker: Lae'zel
6.text: I should be humiliated. I should know the shame of defeat. I am Lae'zel -
6.context: NodeContext: Said with growing passion for the player

46.speaker: Player
46.text: Take her hand and pull her up.
46.context: NodeContext: Stinging from being beaten in combat, but passionate towards the player

2.speaker: Player
2.context: NodeContext: Stinging from being beaten in combat, but passionate towards the player

66.speaker: Lae'zel
66.text: Save your compliments. I won't accept them.
66.context: NodeContext: Stinging from being beaten in combat, but passionate towards the player

16.speaker: Lae'zel
16.text: Smile and pull Lae'zel to the ground.
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] The player tackles Lae'zel and they fall to the ground. Their faces are an inch away from each other.

75.speaker: Player
75.text: Smile and pull Lae'zel to the ground.
75.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] The player tackles Lae'zel and they fall to the ground. Their faces are an inch away from each other.

32.text: Zhak vo'n'ash duj. Source of my bruises.
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] The player tackles Lae'zel and they fall to the ground. Their faces are an inch away from each other.

34.text: Zhak vo'n'ash duj. Source of my bruises.

65.speaker: Lae'zel
65.text: Zhak vo'n'ash duj. Source of my bruises.

20.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Player on top of Lae'zel - the two kiss. Fade to black.NodeContext: ZHAHK vo-nahsh DOO. With great physical passion

27.speaker: Lae'zel
27.text: Zhak vo'n'ash duj. Source of my bruises.
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Lae'zel kiss, and then pull apart.

71.speaker: Lae'zel
71.text: Zhak vo'n'ash duj. Source of my bruises.
71.context: NodeContext: As romantic as it gets for Lae'zel. ZHAHK vo-nahsh DOO.

17.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Lae'zel and the player pull each other close and continue their kiss. Fade to black.

11.text: Zhak vo'n'ash duj. Source of my bruises.
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: The short player and Lae'zel kiss, and then pull apart.

42.speaker: Lae'zel
42.text: Zhak vo'n'ash duj. Source of my bruises.
42.context: NodeContext: As romantic as it gets for Lae'zel. ZHAHK vo-nahsh DOO.

64.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Lae'zel and the short player pull each other close and continue their kiss. Fade to black.

60.speaker: Player
60.text: This is the mighty Lae'zel? What an embarrassment. You've gone soft.
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel stares at the player for a moment, and then smiles.NodeContext: Smiling.

9.speaker: Lae'zel
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel stares at the player for a moment, and then smiles.NodeContext: Smiling.

3.speaker: Player
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Player tackles Lae'zel and they fall to the ground, faces close.

55.text: Zhak vo'n'ash duj. Source of my bruises.
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Player tackles Lae'zel and they fall to the ground, faces close.

77.text: Zhak vo'n'ash duj. Source of my bruises.
77.context: NodeContext: With great passion. ZHAHK vo-nahsh DOO.

23.speaker: Lae'zel
23.text: Zhak vo'n'ash duj. Source of my bruises.
23.context: NodeContext: With great passion. ZHAHK vo-nahsh DOO.

73.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Lae'zel pushes her lips to the players and they kiss. Fade to black.

19.speaker: Player
19.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] The player turns their back and walks away. We see Lae'zels blank face, and then fade to black.

59.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] The player turns their back and walks away. We see Lae'zels blank face, and then fade to black.

4.speaker: Player
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel's face slowly hardens before she speaks. She opened herself up. It will never happen again.NodeContext: Hardened but the slightest hint of dejection.

81.speaker: Lae'zel
81.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel's face slowly hardens before she speaks. She opened herself up. It will never happen again.NodeContext: Hardened but the slightest hint of dejection.

39.speaker: Lae'zel
39.context: NodeContext: Hardened but the slightest hint of dejection.

29.speaker: Lae'zel
29.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Lae'zel walks away from player, but turns her head a moment later.

Lae'zel looking back to player.NodeContext: A little softer in attitude. She is calling the player that just rejected them by the pet name she secretly gave them.

80.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Lae'zel turns and faces forward, away from the player. She walks away and fade to black.

49.speaker: Lae'zel
49.text: Yet I cannot take of your flesh, of your body. I can withstand anything in the realms, but not the fire in you.

18.speaker: Lae'zel
18.text: I cannot master you. I cannot even try.

78.speaker: Lae'zel
78.text: I am made malleable by the flames in you. By the inferno of the Hells. But I cannot touch you. I can have no part of you - none!

1.speaker: Player
1.context: NodeContext: Stinging from being beaten in combat, but passionate towards the player

72.speaker: Lae'zel
72.context: NodeContext: Stinging from being beaten in combat, but passionate towards the player

40.speaker: Lae'zel
40.text: But I also didn't doubt me.
40.context: NodeContext: Stinging from being beaten in combat, but passionate towards the player

14.speaker: Player
14.text: Pathetic. That's the best you could do?
14.context: NodeContext: Stinging from being beaten in combat, but passionate towards the player

28.speaker: Lae'zel
28.text: It was. Your wounds are your proof.
28.context: NodeContext: Stinging from being beaten in combat, but passionate towards the player

30.text: You were stronger. I was steel, and you were silver.
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel rises to her feet. She and the player face each other.

52.text: You were stronger. I was steel, and you were silver.
52.context: NodeContext: Complimenting the player. Passionate for player

44.speaker: Lae'zel
44.text: You were stronger. I was steel, and you were silver.
44.context: NodeContext: Complimenting the player. Passionate for player
